text:
e="preserve">Ajibade Kunde Babalade (29 March 1972 – 4 September 2020) was a Nigerian footballer. He played as a defender. He was Team Chef of Shooting Stars FC. From 1990 to 1998, he played for the national team.
In October 2008, he was named as manager of the Shooting Stars F.C..
Babalade died on 4 September 2020, aged 48.
